Desc.entry: A registered charity that works to create partnerships between existing and new organisations and aims to promote the social and economic regeneration of Heeley and Meersbrook, to create an information and resource agency for the area, to act as a management and development agency for new projects and co-ordinate regeneration in the area. Has strong links with local environmental groups. Responsible for managing the development of the Heeley Millennium Park. Company limited by guarantee no 3288676.
